body_text:
"It's complicated". "system principal" is typically what we understand "privileged" or "chrome privileged" to mean, and there's only 1 of those.
However, the code here would also work for 2 non-privileged scopes (so if you had sandboxed bar.com code that cared about a promise from foo.com). So maybe just 'privilege' isn't necessarily the best term here, although of course really the only consumers here care about privileged code <-> sandboxed code interaction...

body_html:
"It's complicated". "system principal" is typically what we understand "privileged" or "chrome privileged" to mean, and there's only 1 of those.

However, the code here would also work for 2 non-privileged scopes (so if you had sandboxed bar.com code that cared about a promise from foo.com). So maybe just 'privilege' isn't necessarily the best term here, although of course really the only consumers here care about privileged code <-> sandboxed code interaction...
